publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2995 Margaret Jamieson: Carpet Manufacturing in Scotland-That the Parliament regrets the workforce reductions announced today by Stoddard International affecting employees at Kilmarnock and Elderslie and the subsequent closure and transfer of the Elderslie facility to Kilmarnock and calls upon the Scottish Executive to work with all public agencies, Stoddard International Plc, trade unions and other interested parties to ensure the continuation of the last carpet weaving manufacturer in Scotland.
S1M-2995 Carpet Manufacturing in Scotland (lodged on 16 April 2002) Brian Fitzpatrick*, Scott Barrie*, Mr John McAllion*, Angus MacKay*, Marilyn Livingstone*, Trish Godman*, Janis Hughes*
S1M-2995 Carpet Manufacturing in Scotland (lodged on 16 April 2002) Dorothy-Grace Elder*, Rhoda Grant*

S1M-2995 Margaret Jamieson: Carpet Manufacturing in Scotland-That the Parliament regrets the workforce reductions announced today by Stoddard International affecting employees at Kilmarnock and Elderslie and the subsequent closure and transfer of the Elderslie facility to Kilmarnock and calls upon the Scottish Executive to work with all public agencies, Stoddard International Plc, trade unions and other interested parties to ensure the continuation of the last carpet weaving manufacturer in Scotland. Supported by: Brian Fitzpatrick, Scott Barrie, Mr John McAllion, Angus MacKay, Marilyn Livingstone, Trish Godman, Janis Hughes, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Rhoda Grant, Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-2995 Carpet Manufacturing in Scotland (lodged on 16 April 2002) Brian Adam*
S1M-2995 Carpet Manufacturing in Scotland (lodged on 16 April 2002) Irene Oldfather*
S1M-2995 Carpet Manufacturing in Scotland (lodged on 16 April 2002) Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Gil Paterson*
S1M-2995 Carpet Manufacturing in Scotland (lodged on 16 April 2002) Alex Neil*, Karen Gillon*
S1M-2995 Carpet Manufacturing in Scotland (lodged on 16 April 2002) Pauline McNeill*, Bill Butler*
S1M-2995 Carpet Manufacturing in Scotland (lodged on 16 April 2002) Helen Eadie*
S1M-2995 Carpet Manufacturing in Scotland (lodged on 16 April 2002) Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Donald Gorrie*, Mr Michael McMahon*, Maureen Macmillan*
S1M-2995 Carpet Manufacturing in Scotland (lodged on 16 April 2002) Elaine Smith*
S1M-2995 Carpet Manufacturing in Scotland (lodged on 16 April 2002) Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh*
S1M-2995 Carpet Manufacturing in Scotland (lodged on 16 April 2002) Cathy Peattie*
